document_data.name: Serelis Greenleaf
document_data.mainbody: '''Serelis Greenleaf''' was a [[ranger]] in the [[Quivering Forest]] near [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Serelis usually acted as a mediator between the [[Kabel's Hill]]'s community and the [[elves]] of the forest.
document_data.History: Serelis lived in the Quivering Forest near Kabel's Hill. He was possibly involved in the case of the disappearance of [[Halvin Graingle]] and six other villagers inside the forest when an adventuring party went to ask for his help.{{Cite adventurers league/Tales Trees Tell|14-15}}
